birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市

description.zh-cn: 中国媒体人、网红，中国共产党党员。曾任《人民日报》战地记者、《环球时报》总编辑及人民网股份有限公司董事，现为《环球时报》特约评论员。其言论常引发争议。
description.en: A Chinese media personality, internet celebrity, and member of the Communist Party of China. He formerly served as a war correspondent for People's Daily, editor-in-chief of Global Times, and a board member of People.cn Co., Ltd. He is currently a special commentator for Global Times. His remarks often generate controversy.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会机关报《人民日报》社主办与出版的国际新闻报刊。
description.en: An international news newspaper sponsored and published by the People's Daily, the official newspaper of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，2021年12月接替胡锡进担任《环球时报》党委书记兼社长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who succeeded Hu Xijin as the Party Secretary and President of Global Times in December 2021.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任人民日报社国际部副主任，2021年12月接替胡锡进担任《环球时报》总编辑。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, formerly the deputy director of the International Department of the People's Daily, who succeeded Hu Xijin as editor-in-chief of Global Times in December 2021.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军国际关系学院

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国际关系学院
中国人民解放军国防科技大学国际关系学院

description.zh-cn: 胡锡进的父亲，曾在中国火箭科研系统担任会计。
description.en: Hu Xijin's father, who worked as an accountant in China's rocket research system.

description.zh-cn: 胡锡进的母亲。
description.en: Hu Xijin's mother.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记，中华人民共和国主席，中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政法大学资本金融研究院院长。
description.en: Dean of the Capital Finance Institute at the China University of Political Science and Law.

nodes.id: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室

zh-cn: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾任美国众议院议长。
description.en: American politician who served as the Speaker of the United States House of Representatives.

description.zh-cn: 中国网络评论员，红三代。
description.en: A Chinese internet commentator and a third-generation red princeling.

nodes.id: 江西工业职业技术学院食品安全事件

zh-cn: 江西工业职业技术学院食品安全事件
en: Jiangxi Industry Polytechnic College food safety incident

description.zh-cn: 前中国驻法大使、前外交学院院长。
description.en: Former Chinese Ambassador to France and former President of the China Foreign Affairs University.

description.zh-cn: 中国电影导演。
description.en: A Chinese film director.

description.zh-cn: 由贾樟柯执导的电影。
description.en: A film directed by Jia Zhangke.

description.zh-cn: 复旦大学国际政治系副教授。
description.en: Associate professor in the Department of International Politics at Fudan University.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央政法委旗下的官方新闻网站。
description.en: The official news website under the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the CCP.

en: Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 香港中文大学副教授。
description.en: Associate Professor at The Chinese University of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 《环球时报》副总编辑，曾实名举报胡锡进生活作风问题。
description.en: Deputy editor-in-chief of Global Times, who once reported Hu Xijin for alleged personal misconduct.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军国际关系学院

description.zh-cn: 身为军人及学生来到天安门参加了天安门抗议。
description.en: As a soldier and student, he went to Tiananmen Square to participate in the protests.

description.zh-cn: 被认为是战狼外交式言辞的早期倡导者。
description.en: Considered an early advocate for the style of Wolf Warrior diplomacy.

description.zh-cn: 发文对中国不断的封城表达不满，表示只有成本可控的清零才更有意义，过度清零后果严重。
description.en: Published an article expressing dissatisfaction with China's continuous lockdowns, stating that only a zero-COVID policy with controllable costs is meaningful and that excessive measures would have severe consequences.

description.zh-cn: 在2022年南希·佩洛西访问台湾前，胡锡进在推特上发文威胁，若解放军警告与驱离佩洛西专机无效，可将其击落。
description.en: Prior to Nancy Pelosi's visit to Taiwan in 2022, Hu Xijin posted on Twitter threatening that if the PLA's warnings and attempts to drive away Pelosi's plane were ineffective, it could be shot down.

description.zh-cn: 胡锡进卸任《环球时报》党委书记兼社长，由范正伟接任。
description.en: Hu Xijin stepped down as Party Secretary and President of the Global Times, and was succeeded by Fan Zhengwei.

description.zh-cn: 胡锡进卸任《环球时报》总编辑，由吴绮敏接任。
description.en: Hu Xijin stepped down as Editor-in-Chief of the Global Times, and was succeeded by Wu Qimin.

description.zh-cn: 据香港《明报》报道，习近平肯定了胡锡进的宣传方式，并要求中共文宣系统加以效仿。
description.en: According to Hong Kong's Ming Pao, Xi Jinping affirmed Hu Xijin's propaganda methods and instructed the CCP's propaganda system to emulate them.

description.zh-cn: 因组织公款旅游，中纪委驻人民日报社纪检组对其进行调查并给予行政警告处分。
description.en: Due to organizing a tour with public funds, the CCDI's discipline inspection group stationed at the People's Daily investigated him and issued an administrative warning.

relationships.source: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 网信办批评《环球时报》下属环球网“炒作”六四等敏感政治话题，并下令其整改。
description.en: The Cyberspace Administration of China criticized Global Times' website for 'hyping' sensitive political topics like the June 4th incident and ordered it to rectify.

description.zh-cn: 吴建民在讲座中批评胡锡进及其领导的《环球时报》文章极端，胡锡进则回应称吴建民是外交圈的“鸽派”。该论战因吴建民意外逝世而中止。
description.en: Wu Jianmin criticized articles by Hu Xijin and his Global Times as extremist in a lecture, to which Hu responded by calling Wu a 'dove' in diplomatic circles. The debate ended with Wu's accidental death.

description.zh-cn: 因胡锡进批评其电影《江湖儿女》充满“负能量”，贾樟柯发表长文逐条回应，引发论战。胡锡进后删除微博并表示接受回应。
description.en: After Hu Xijin criticized his film 'Ash Is Purest White' for being full of 'negative energy,' Jia Zhangke published a lengthy article responding point by point, sparking a debate. Hu later deleted his post and accepted the response.

description.zh-cn: 就中国官方微博发布的“中国点火VS印度点火”图片，沈逸反驳胡锡进应高举人道主义大旗的观点，引发论战。
description.en: Regarding the 'China ignition vs. India ignition' image posted on an official Chinese Weibo account, Shen Yi rebutted Hu Xijin's view that China should uphold the banner of humanitarianism, sparking a debate.

description.zh-cn: 就佩洛西访台事件，兔主席指责胡锡进的言论拔高调门、透支政府公信力，并要求其向全国人民道歉。
description.en: Regarding the Pelosi visit to Taiwan, Rabbit Chairman accused Hu Xijin of raising the tone excessively, overdrawing the government's credibility, and demanded he apologize to the entire nation.

description.zh-cn: 在胡锡进的讲座上，因不满其“中共代表13亿人民意志”的言论，当场发起举手投票并脱鞋离场抗议。
description.en: During a lecture by Hu Xijin, Chow Po Chung, dissatisfied with his statement that 'the CCP represents the will of 1.3 billion people,' initiated a show of hands and protested by taking off his shoes and leaving the venue.

description.zh-cn: 段静涛实名举报胡锡进与两名女员工有不正当关系并育有私生子，后被官方认定为不实举报。
description.en: Duan Jingtao publicly reported Hu Xijin for having improper relationships with two female employees and fathering illegitimate children, which was later officially determined to be unfounded.

description.zh-cn: 《环球时报》是《人民日报》社主办与出版的报刊。
description.en: The Global Times is a newspaper sponsored and published by the People's Daily.

description.zh-cn: 中国长安网是中共中央政法委旗下的网站。
description.en: China-defense.com is a website under the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 在白纸运动后，中国政府于2022年12月公布新十条，终结动态清零政策。
description.en: Following the White Paper Protests, the Chinese government announced the New Ten Measures in December 2022, ending the dynamic zero-COVID policy.

description.zh-cn: 新十条的公布标志着动态清零政策的终结。
description.en: The announcement of the New Ten Measures marked the end of the dynamic zero-COVID policy.

description.zh-cn: 与学生胡雨欣共同出版了该书。
description.en: Co-authored and published the book with student Hu Yuxin.

description.zh-cn: 与胡锡进共同出版了该书。
description.en: Co-authored and published the book with Hu Xijin.
